# Set `Ref` based on Styled Components version/environment.


```jsx
import React from 'react'
import UNSAFE_SetEnvRef from '@uie/set-env-ref'

class SomeComponent extends React.Component {
  refKey = UNSAFE_SetEnvRef();

  render() {
    return (
      /**
       * {...{ [this.refKey]: elem => (this.elementRefName = elem) }}
       * the above  spread of the an object on to a JSX Element or Styled Component
       * will evaluate to one of the following based on the version of styled components used
       *
       * styled-components 3.x.x uses innerRef
       * innerRef={elem => (this.elementRefName = elem)}
       *
       * styled-components 4.x.x uses ref
       * ref={elem => (this.elementRefName = elem)}
       */
      <JSXElement   {...{ [this.refKey]: elem => (this.elementRefName = elem) } }>
        {this.props.children}
      </JSXElement>
    )
  }
}
```
